description:
Since 1996, TAAQ has toured across India and worldwide, released eight studio
albums, opened for icons like Guns N’ Roses and Deep Purple, and topped the
Euro Indie and World Indie charts. Expect a New Year’s Eve powered by TAAQ’s
signature blend of Rock, Blues, Funk, and Retro—high energy, tight grooves,
and a countdown that lands like a finale riff.
name: Windmills Music Night - Ring In The New Year With TAAQ

performer.description: Thermal And A Quarter (TAAQ) is a pioneering rock band from Bangalore, India—hailed by NPR (USA) as “on the vanguard of the Indian Rock scene.” Their sound, known as Bangalore Rock, blends global influences with the energy and ethos of a city at the crossroads of culture and technology.
performer.name: Ring In The New Year With TAAQ
